Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Should there be a seperate poll for 
OOCs (no pressure Yan lol)? 

  o yes 
  o no 
  o DO YOU REALLY THINK YAN HAS TIME FOR THAT! HE'S GOING THROUGH ENOUGH TROUBLE TO SAY HE'LL TRY TO UPDATE THE SITE ONCE IN A WHILE! 
  o why? 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls

not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups
